required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of FTP-198 Tablet in Healthy Chinese Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Single Doses of FTP 198 in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase I, single-dose escalation clinical trial for FTP-198 conducted in chinese healthy volunteers. The safety, tolerability, food-impact and pharmacokinetics of FTP-198 tablet in healthy volunteers will be evaluated using a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial design.

primary_outcome.measure: The number and severity of treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs)
primary_outcome.description: To assess the safety and tolerability of single and multiple ascending oral doses of FTP-198 in healthy Chinese subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: The level of changes of pharmacodynamic biomarkers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 24 hours (single dose) or 48 hours (multiple doses) after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The change-from-baseline values of plasma lysophosphatidic acid (LPA) as PD biomarkers

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration
within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration

arm_group.description: Drug: FTP-198, single dose 100mg Drug: Placebo, single dose Placebo matched to FTP-198, tablet

Drug: FTP-198, single dose 300mg Drug: Placebo, single dose Placebo matched to FTP-198, tablet 2-X: fasting (Period 1) ; 2-Y:Postprandial (Period 1) 2-X:Postprandial (Period 2); 2-Y:fasting (Period 2)
Drug: FTP-198, single dose 600mg Drug: Placebo, single dose Placebo matched to FTP-198, tablet

intervention.description: Placebo is a tablet with the same appearance as FTP-198
